channel.copyright: Random thoughts on software, life, and who's still reading?

item.title: My First VSCode Extension
item.description: My first VSCode Extension I’ve been using VSCode as my editor of choice for quite a while now. It’s a really well-made editor for programmers, featuring many community made high quality extensions. One of the features I use quite often is multiple selection. You can edit many places at the same time entering the same text. What I was missing however, was an easy to use feature where I could insert a sequence of numbers, for example to do array access.
